description:
Gain speed and endurance on open water. The Leverlock adjustment system is easy easy to use and perfect for sharing among multiple users or for tweaking your paddle length as conditions change. The elastomer grip is soft to the touch and encourages a lighter grip to reduce tension and fatigue.

  • Smooth carbon shaft features 16-inch adjustability
  • Leverlock adjustment system in handle offers fast, easy adjustments on the fly
  • Soft elastomer grip encourages a lighter grip on the shaft
  • Oval cross section encourages consistent hand placement and better stroke mechanics
  • Super-tough fibreglass/nylon blade with a dihedral face for smooth, predictable strokes
  • Large blade for pushing lots of water with each stroke
name: Accent Advantage Hybrid Adjustable SUP Paddle
